about_the_game:
Paradise Beach Simulator is a simulation game in which you set up your business on a paradise island.

Drop everything to start over...on a paradise island!

Paradise Beach Simulator is a simulation game in which you set up your business on a paradise island.

As a former employee who fled his dull job, you are welcomed by an uncle you had lost sight of for years. He is determined to teach you all the tricks to set up your business. Despite an island in a deplorable state, you roll up your sleeves and get to work: you will have to clean, clear and restore all its splendor to this lost paradise, before planting the first equipment of your business.

Rehabilitate the island and make this wasted place a dream spot!

🧽Clean And Transform

The island is in a pitiful state: clear the waste to make the island clean and eradicate the old buildings. Bring back the fish, make the sand white and plant new trees!

🏖️ Order, install, welcome

Just because you're at the end of the world doesn't mean you don't have internet access. Order your equipment and decoration, and wait for the express boat to deliver.

Arrange your first towels to satisfy your customers. Welcome them by making sure their needs are met. Offer them shade, decorate the island, and don't forget they will be thirsty because it's hot.

A satisfied customer is a customer who leaves good comments ;)

🐠 Hunt And Harvest your plantations

Roam the island to spearfish and collect the ingredients you need for your snack bar. Grow your own fruit trees and harvest their ripe fruits!

🍹Prepare drinks and meals

Cut, grill, assemble, serve! The meals and drinks you offer your customers will be fresh and local.

🤿 Entertain Your Customers

Offer your customers numerous activities: sunbathing on the beach, snorkeling, jet skiing, underwater activities, ... Don't hesitate to enjoy with them, they will be even more satisfied.

🌅 Craft and sell items of your creation

Your customers love to bring back a souvenir from their sunny destination. Offer them for sale items of your creation!

🔧 Maintain Your Equipment

Clean your towels, pick up the trash,... Your equipment and infrastructure need maintenance to function.

🌅 Explore

The island hides a story and many secrets. Hop on your jet ski and discover treasures all around the island.

💁‍♂️ Recruit

You will quickly need a helping hand! Recruit your employees according to their skills and characters and manage their work schedule. Give them promotions to increase their happiness, but if they are too lazy, fire them!

short_description: Paradise Beach Simulator is a first-person management simulation game where you transform an abandoned island into a thriving business. Welcome your customers, maintain your equipment, manage your staff and discover your island, all while restoring the beauty of a lost paradise.
